newsitem.title: MAURITIUS: Mauritius sells $7.33 million in treasury bills.
newsitem.headline: Mauritius sells $7.33 million in treasury bills.

text.p: The Central Bank of Mauritius sold 160 million rupees ($7.33 million) worth of treasury bills at its weekly auction on Thursday from 300 million rupees on offer.
The bank sold 91-day bills worth 15 million rupees at a weighted average yield of 8.19 percent against 90 million rupees at 8.06 percent last week.
The bank sold 182-day bills worth 65 million rupees with an average yield of 8.36 percent, versus with 50 million rupees at 8.52 percent last week.
It sold 364-day bills worth 80 million rupees at an average yield of 8.53 percent compared with 10 million rupees at 8.52 percent last week.
This week's effective bank rate was posted at 8.43 percent per year from 8.15 percent last week, the bank said. ($1=21.818 Mauritian rupees)
